name: checkdot-trust-score-functions
description: Library project to provide different back-end and front-end parties with the same functions for calculating the scores of different parts of a crypto project.

scripts.package:release: rm -rf ./package && mkdir ./package && cp -r ./dist/ ./package/dist && cp README.md package.json ./package
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run package:release && npm publish ./package --access public

author: Jeremy Guyet
